title: AdapTable
description: AdapTable for AG Grid is a powerful extension for the market-leading AG Grid Data Grid. AdapTable extends the powerful functionality provided by AG Grid to enable you to build data management applications unparalleled in power and sophistication, with features not previously available.
ag_grid_usage: Extends AG Grid functionality and exposes additional APIs

title: Dash AG Grid
description: Dash AG Grid is a high-performance and highly customizable component that wraps AG Grid, designed for creating rich datagrids.

title: Astro UXDS
description: Astro UXDS is a collection of guidelines, patterns and components for designing space-based user interface applications. The Astro Space UX Design System enables developers and designers to build rich space app experiences with established interaction patterns and best practices.

title: Streamlit AG Grid
description: Streamlit is an open-source Python framework for machine learning and data science teams. This library, from Pablo Fonseca, implements AG Grid and AG Charts into Streamlit

title: Nice GUI
description: NiceGUI is an open-source Python library to write graphical user interfaces which run in the browser. It has a very gentle learning curve while still offering the option for advanced customizations. NiceGUI follows a backend-first philosophy: It handles all the web development details.

title: GoodData UI SDK
description: GoodData.UI is a TypeScript framework for building analytical applications on top of the GoodData platform, GoodData Cloud or GoodData.CN.

title: Sky UX
description: Blackbaud's open source framework leverages reusable design patterns and components to create impactful, cohesive experiences across web applications.

title: AG Grid Svelte
description: An unofficial Svelte wrapper for AG Grid, designed to provide a seamless AG Grid integration to any Svelte project. This wrapper exposes all grid options and is fully compatible with AG Grid, up to v30.

title: ipyaggrid
description: A wrapper for using AG Grid in Jupyter notebooks. The goal of this ipywidget is to harness the power of the excellent Javascript library ag-Grid

title: Lowdefy
description: The config web stack for business apps - build internal tools, client portals, web apps, admin panels, dashboards, web sites, and CRUD apps with YAML or JSON.

title: Hoist UX Toolkit
description: Built on a careful integration of server and client technologies, Hoist provides an opinionated yet flexible foundation for building and operating enterprise web applications.

title: Vuestic UI
description: Vuestic UI is an OpenSource Vue 3 based UI framework. It is a MIT-licensed UI framework that provides ready-to-use frontend components that are easily configurable and speed up development of responsive and fast-loading web interfaces.

title: Cypress AG Grid
description: With Cypress, you can easily create tests for your modern web applications, debug them visually, and automatically run them in your continuous integration builds. This plugin simplifies interacting with and validating against ag grid with Cypress.

title: AG Grid Laravel Server Side Adapter
description: A server-side adapter for AG Grid with support for filtering, sorting, exporting and server-side selection.

title: AG Grid Playwright
description: A simple way to test ag-grid with Playwright. Extensible enough to cover the all of ag-grid's features.

title: React GEO
description: react-geo is a JavaScript library providing a large number of components to build modern mapping applications. It is used in combination with React, OpenLayers and Ant Design.

title: Grid Widget for BBJ
description: A Feature-rich grid component for BBj Based on HTML and JavaScript.

title: OpenMrs React Components
description: OpenMRS is a collaborative open-source project to develop software to support the delivery of health care in developing countries. OpenMRS is founded on the principles of openness and sharing of ideas, software and strategies for deployment and use.

title: OSharp
description: OSharp is a rapid development framework based on .Net6.0.

title: Otter
description: The Otter project is a highly modular framework whose goal is to provide a common platform to accelerate and facilitate the development of runtime customizable Angular based Web Applications

title: PortalJS
description: Rapidly build rich data portals using a modern frontend framework

title: Feliz AG Grid
description: Feliz-style bindings for ag-grid-react

title: Elm AG Grid
description: Elm integration for the Ag Grid data grid library.

title: Blazor AG Grid
description: Blazor-wrapped component over ag-Grid

title: SUI Base
description: Sui development environment and cookbook.

title: AG Grid RS (Rust)
description: Rust bindings for the AG Grid JavaScript table library.

title: Baloise Design System
description: The Baloise Design System consists of reusable components and a clearly defined visual style, that can be assembled together to build any number of applications.

title: SBA Angular
description: Sinequa's Angular-based Search Based Application (SBA) Framework

title: AG Grid OData
description: OData (Open Data Protocol) is an ISO/IEC approved, OASIS standard that defines a set of best practices for building and consuming RESTful APIs. This library creates an Odata compliant provider for AG Grid
